title: Eddie Jones claims England training spied on 'from apartment block' ahead of New Zealand semi-final
text:
Eddie Jones has claimed England were spied on during their training session on Tuesday as they began preparations for their World Cup semi-final against New Zealand.

Jones said the team had been aware that someone with a camera had filmed their entire session from the window of an apartment block overlooking their training pitch at the Disneyland resort in Tokyo Bay.

The England squad’s security detail spotted a red light from the camera but Jones said he went ahead with the session as planned.
